name: HotelFlex
slogan: Check-in or out of your room as early or as late as you want
description:
Hotelflex is shaking up the way the hotel industry manages inventory. We don't believe in the prehistoric 3pm check-in and 11am check-out, surely you (the guest) can choose when you want to arrive and depart and then pay accordingly, right? We agree, which is why we're building a product that lets you do just that!

Whilst this concept makes total sense for the guest, it's also incredibly attractive for hotels as it's incremental revenue, in other words, pure bottom-line profit. A typical 300-400 bed hotel using Hotelflex can generate an additional $2,500 - $18,000 per month, which, as profit margin goes, is huge! This number varies so much because there are so many factors at play, such as the pricing structure, available inventory, and guest messaging, all of which can be optimised.

jobs.title: HotelFlex is hiring London based software engineers
jobs.description:

----------------------------
What we're building
----------------------------
Hotelflex is shaking up the way the hotel industry manages inventory. We don't believe in the prehistoric 3pm check-in and 11am check-out, surely you (the guest) can choose when you want to arrive and depart and then pay accordingly, right? We agree, which is why we're building a product that lets you do just that!

-----------------------------
About you
------------------------------
You love building new things
You love doing things efficiently
You have worked with teams before on large Node JS web projects
You are productive even in the absence of a task list
You are clear and concise in your communication

----------------------------
About the job
----------------------------
Help us innovate, plan and build new product features
Extend and maintain our existing services and architecture
Release new code to thousands of hotel guests each week
Extend our integrations into new hotel tech stacks - directly impacting our sales reach and growth
Get stuck in with code reviews and testing so that everyone can enjoy a quality codebase!

----------------------------
Our stack
----------------------------
Node JS
Postgres (SQL)
RabbitMQ (AMQP messaging)
Kubernetes (Hosted on GCP)
React (frontend)

----------------------------
Benefits, Growth, and Development
----------------------------
We welcome growth and development and want to work with you to make sure you always have the opportunity to step out of your comfort zone and progress your skills. Joining a startup has numerous benefits such as, the ability to quickly progress into owner/leader positions, shape company culture, hire new teammates, gain equity in a rapidly growing company, and in our case, enjoy being part of a company that has an impact on holidaymakers and travellers all over the world. All of these things make working at our startup so much fun! and we hope to be able to share that with you.
